"Special Mission: Magatsu [Silver]":
"On Harkotan, we managed to weaken
and contain the Kuronites and \"Magatsu\"
in a section near the \"Sealed Grounds.\"
ARKS who are willingly able to take on
resealing \"Magatsu,\" should travel now.
A.I.S. will be deployed there and are
recommended to use the A.I.S. early on.
――――――――――――――――――――
Start: Use Magatsu Bonus Key [Silver]
Clear by defeating enemies before time limit ends."
